p: Dahong ( 21) isolated Ferulin C, a natural sesquiterpene coumarin, from Ferula ferulaeoides, and tested its anti-proliferative activity against breast cancer cells in vitro and in vivo. In vitro, by decreasing the expression and nuclear localization of p-AKTSer473, Ferulin C (20Î¼M) significantly inhibited the expression and phosphorylation of AKT and its downstream member mTOR, thus inducing autophagy of tumor cells.
